getMethodTable.name: getMethodTable
getMethodTable.description: Get a list of all methods available.

getCategory.name: getCategory
getCategory.description: Retrieves a top-level Category by tag.

getSubCategory.name: getSubCategory
getSubCategory.description: Retrieves a second-level Category by tag and subtag.

getSubSubCategory.name: getSubSubCategory
getSubSubCategory.description: Retrieves a third-level Category by tag, subtag and subsubtag.

findAllListingsForFeaturedTreasuryId.name: findAllListingsForFeaturedTreasuryId
findAllListingsForFeaturedTreasuryId.description: Finds all listings for a certain FeaturedTreasury.

findAllActiveListingsForFeaturedTreasury.name: findAllActiveListingsForFeaturedTreasuryId
findAllActiveListingsForFeaturedTreasury.description: Finds all active listings for a certain FeaturedTreasury.

findAllCurrentFeaturedListings.name: findAllCurrentFeaturedListings
findAllCurrentFeaturedListings.description: Finds FeaturedTreasury listings that are currently displayed on a regional homepage.

findAllFeaturedTreasuriesByOwner.name: findAllFeaturedTreasuriesByOwner
findAllFeaturedTreasuriesByOwner.description: Finds all FeaturedTreasury by numeric owner_id.

addToGuestCart.name: addToGuestCart
addToGuestCart.description: Add a listing to guest's cart

updateGuestCartListingQuantity.name: updateGuestCartListingQuantity
updateGuestCartListingQuantity.description: Update a guest's cart listing purchase quantity

removeGuestCartListing.name: removeGuestCartListing
removeGuestCartListing.description: Remove a listing from a guest's cart

claimGuest.name: claimGuest
claimGuest.description: Claim this guest to the associated user. Merges the GuestCart's associated with this GuestId into the logged in User's Carts. Returns the number of listings merged in meta['listings_merged'].

generateGuest.name: generateGuest
generateGuest.description: A helper method that generates a Guest ID to associate to this anonymous session. This method is not strictly necessary, as any sufficiently random guest ID that is 13 characters in length will suffice and automatically create a guest account on use if it does not yet exist.

listImageTypes.name: listImageTypes
listImageTypes.description: Lists available image types along with their supported sizes.

createListing.name: createListing
createListing.description: Creates a new Listing. NOTE: A shipping_template_id is required when creating a listing. NOTE: All listings created on www.etsy.com must be actual items for sale. Creating active test or otherwise unreal listings may lead to your shop being frozen. Please use the API Sandbox for all test listing creation.

params.title: string
params.recipient: enum(men, women, unisex_adults, teen_boys, teen_girls, teens, boys, girls, children, baby_boys, baby_girls, babies, birds, cats, dogs, pets)
params.occasion: enum(anniversary, baptism, bar_or_bat_mitzvah, birthday, canada_day, chinese_new_year, cinco_de_mayo, confirmation, christmas, day_of_the_dead, easter, eid, engagement, fathers_day, get_well, graduation, halloween, hanukkah, housewarming, kwanza, prom, july_4th, mothers_day, new_baby, new_years, quinceanera, retirement, st_patricks_day, sweet_16, sympathy, thanksgiving, valentines, wedding)

params.title: string
params.recipient: enum(men, women, unisex_adults, teen_boys, teen_girls, teens, boys, girls, children, baby_boys, baby_girls, babies, birds, cats, dogs, pets)
params.occasion: enum(anniversary, baptism, bar_or_bat_mitzvah, birthday, canada_day, chinese_new_year, cinco_de_mayo, confirmation, christmas, day_of_the_dead, easter, eid, engagement, fathers_day, get_well, graduation, halloween, hanukkah, housewarming, kwanza, prom, july_4th, mothers_day, new_baby, new_years, quinceanera, retirement, st_patricks_day, sweet_16, sympathy, thanksgiving, valentines, wedding)

findAllListingFavoredBy.name: findAllListingFavoredBy
findAllListingFavoredBy.description: Retrieves a set of FavoriteListing objects associated to a Listing.

findAllListingFiles.name: findAllListingFiles
findAllListingFiles.description: Finds all ListingFiles on a Listing

uploadListingFile.name: uploadListingFile
uploadListingFile.description:
Upload a new listing file, or attach an existing file to this listing.  You must either provide the listing_file_id
of an existing listing file, or the name and file data of a new file that you are uploading.  If you are attaching
a file to a listing that is currently not digital, the listing will be converted to a digital listing.  This will
cause the listing to have free shipping and will remove any variations.

deleteListingFile.name: deleteListingFile
deleteListingFile.description:
Removes the listing file from this listing.  If this is the last file on a listing, the listing will no longer
be considered a digital listing.

findAllListingImages.name: findAllListingImages
findAllListingImages.description: Retrieves a set of ListingImage objects associated to a Listing.

uploadListingImage.name: uploadListingImage
uploadListingImage.description:
Upload a new listing image, or re-associate a previously deleted one. You may associate an image
                                      to any listing within the same shop that the image's original listing belongs to.
                                      You MUST pass either a listing_image_id OR an image to this method.
                                      Passing a listing_image_id serves to re-associate an image that was previously deleted.
                                      If you wish to re-associate an image, we strongly recommend using the listing_image_id
                                      argument as opposed to re-uploading a new image each time, to save bandwidth for you as well as us.
                                      Pass overwrite=1 to replace the existing image at a given rank.

deleteListingImage.name: deleteListingImage
deleteListingImage.description:
Deletes a listing image. A copy of the file remains on our servers,
                                       and so a deleted image may be re-associated with the listing without
                                       re-uploading the original image; see uploadListingImage

findAllListingShippingProfileEntries.name: findAllListingShippingProfileEntries
findAllListingShippingProfileEntries.description: Retrieves a set of ShippingInfo objects associated to a Listing.

getListingTranslation.name: getListingTranslation
getListingTranslation.description: Retrieves a ListingTranslation by listing_id and language

createListingTranslation.name: createListingTranslation
createListingTranslation.description: Creates a ListingTranslation by listing_id and language

updateListingTranslation.name: updateListingTranslation
updateListingTranslation.description: Updates a ListingTranslation by listing_id and language

deleteListingTranslation.name: deleteListingTranslation
deleteListingTranslation.description: Deletes a ListingTranslation by listing_id and language

getListingVariations.name: getListingVariations
getListingVariations.description: Get the listing variations available for a listing.

createListingVariations.name: createListingVariations
createListingVariations.description: Update all of the listing variations available for a listing; optionally set custom property names and property qualifiers. Expects a JSON array with a collection of objects of the form: [{"property_id":200, "value":"Black"}, {"property_id":200, "value":"White"}]

createListingVariation.name: createListingVariation
createListingVariation.description: Add a new listing variation for a listing.

updateListingVariation.name: updateListingVariation
updateListingVariation.description: Update a listing variation for a listing.

deleteListingVariation.name: deleteListingVariation
deleteListingVariation.description: Remove a listing variation for a listing.

findAllListingActive.name: findAllListingActive
findAllListingActive.description: Finds all active Listings. (Note: the sort_on and sort_order options only work when combined with one of the search options: keywords, color, tags, location, etc.)

findAllOrderReceipts.name: findAllOrderReceipts
findAllOrderReceipts.description: Retrieves a set of Receipt objects associated to a Order.

findPaymentAdjustments.name: findPaymentAdjustments
findPaymentAdjustments.description: Get a Payment Adjustments from a Payment Id

findPaymentAdjustment.name: findPaymentAdjustment
findPaymentAdjustment.description: Get a Direct Checkout Payment Adjustment

findPaymentAdjustmentItem.description: Get a Direct Checkout Payment Adjustment Item

getPropertyOptionModifier.name: getPropertyOptionModifier

findPropertySet.name: findPropertySet
findPropertySet.description: Find the property set for the category id

createReceiptOnSandbox.name: createReceiptOnSandbox
createReceiptOnSandbox.description: Creates a purchase for the current OAuth user, including Order, Receipt and Transaction resources. This method is only available via the Sandbox API. Listing IDs must be active, and belong to the same seller user ID. The buyer must have at least one UserAddress record, or an error will be thrown.

findAllReceiptListings.name: findAllReceiptListings
findAllReceiptListings.description: Finds all listings in a receipt

findAllReceiptTransactions.name: findAllReceiptTransactions
findAllReceiptTransactions.description: Retrieves a set of Transaction objects associated to a Receipt.

findBrowseSegmentListings.name: findBrowseSegmentListings
findBrowseSegmentListings.description: Find Listings for a Segment by Segment path

findBrowseSegmentPosters.name: findBrowseSegmentPosters
findBrowseSegmentPosters.description: Find Browse SegmentPosters by Segment slug

getServerEpoch.name: getServerEpoch
getServerEpoch.description: Get server time, in epoch seconds notation.

ping.name: ping
ping.description: Check that the server is alive.

updateShippingInfo.name: updateShippingInfo
updateShippingInfo.description: Updates a ShippingInfo with the given id.

deleteShippingInfo.name: deleteShippingInfo
deleteShippingInfo.description: Deletes the ShippingInfo with the given id.

deleteShippingTemplate.name: deleteShippingTemplate

findAllShippingTemplateEntries.name: findAllShippingTemplateEntries
findAllShippingTemplateEntries.description: Retrieves a set of ShippingTemplateEntry objects associated to a ShippingTemplate.

findAllShops.name: findAllShops
findAllShops.description: Finds all Shops.  If there is a keywords parameter, finds shops with shop_name starting with keywords.

getShopAbout.description: Retrieves a ShopAbout object associated to a Shop.

uploadShopBanner.description: Upload a new shop banner image

findAllShopListingsActive.name: findAllShopListingsActive
findAllShopListingsActive.description:
Finds all active Listings associated with a Shop.

(NOTE: If calling on behalf of a shop owner in the context of listing management, be sure to include the parameter include_private = true. This will return private listings that are not publicly visible in the shop, but which can be managed. This is an experimental feature and may change.)

findAllShopListingsDraft.description: Finds all of a Shop's draft listings

findAllShopListingsExpired.description: Retrieves Listings associated to a Shop that are expired

getShopListingExpired.name: getShopListingExpired
getShopListingExpired.description: Retrieves a Listing associated to a Shop that is inactive

findAllShopListingsFeatured.name: findAllShopListingsFeatured
findAllShopListingsFeatured.description: Retrieves Listings associated to a Shop that are featured

getShopListingInactive.description: Retrieves a Listing associated to a Shop that is inactive

findShopPaymentTemplates.description: Retrieves the PaymentTemplate associated with the Shop

findAllShopReceipts.name: findAllShopReceipts
findAllShopReceipts.description: Retrieves a set of Receipt objects associated to a Shop.

submitTracking.description: Submits tracking information and sends a shipping notification email to the buyer. If send_bcc is true, the shipping notification will be sent to the seller as well. Refer to additional documentation.

params.status: enum(open, unshipped, unpaid, completed, processing, all)

Returns a set of FeedBack objects associated to a User.
                    This is essentially the union between the findAllUserFeedbackAsBuyer
                    and findAllUserFeedbackAsSubject methods.

findAllFeedbackFromSellers.name: findAllFeedbackFromSellers
findAllFeedbackFromSellers.description:
Returns a set of FeedBack objects associated to a User.
                    This is essentially the union between
                    the findAllUserFeedbackAsBuyer and findAllUserFeedbackAsSubject methods.

updateUserProfile.name: updateUserProfile
updateUserProfile.description:
Updates the UserProfile object associated with a User.
Notes:
  • Name changes are subject to admin review and therefore unavailable via the API.
  • Materials must be provided as a period-separated list of ASCII words.

findAllUserTreasuries.description: Get a user's Treasuries. Note: The treasury_r permission scope is required in order to display private Treasuries for a user when the boolean parameter include_private is true.
